DataElement.preferredName: PRO-CTCAE Version 1.0 10b. Past Seven Days Worst Severity Vomiting 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the worst severity they have experienced related to vomiting in the past seven days, using a text term rating of the degree of the severity.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness._A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one._The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not severe or strong; far from extreme; not serious enough to endanger life.

Concepts.definition: Gentle or temperate in nature or degree.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.

Concepts.definition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Intensely or extremely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality, or extent; life threatening.

Concepts.definition: Intensely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Exceedingly intense or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent.

Concepts.definition: Exceedingly intense or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather.:A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.:The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.:an ordered reference standard.

Concepts.definition: Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.
A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
